main event: On October 24, 1962, a civilian reported a sighting of a bright circular object moving from NNW to SSE in the Lansing, Michigan area.
interesting points: The object changed course and moved rapidly, appearing to traverse the sky at a speed of 150-180 knots,The object was observed for approximately 10-12 minutes before disappearing from view,No physical evidence was recovered at the site,The conclusion drawn was that the object was likely a silhouetted helicopter,Multiple witnesses reported unusual aerial phenomena in the area around the same time.
